verbs.description: astronomers [V: have] detected radio waves from our own galaxy bouncing off the moon the entire time the moon has been sitting up there quietly orbiting earth it turns out it actually been doing something incredible something that could help teach us about the early universe ben mckinley monthly notices of the royal astronomical society dr ben mckinley curtin university nasa gsfc arizona state university radio nasagsfcarizona state university icrar arc centre of excellence galaxy murchison widefield array western australia moon mwa international centre for radio astronomy research mckinley benjamin mckinley all sky astrophysics
